MISSION \n\n Provide excellent medical care, with warmth, through a health team committed to training and technological innovation, meeting the highest quality and safety standards and achieving maximum patient satisfaction.
VISIÓN \n\nBe a reference in the province of El Oro and area of influence for quality care, safety and patient satisfaction.
